content: dowse thoroughly with the starch and rub it all over to make sure it gets everywhere then leave to dry overnight once the starch is all dry poke the balloon through the gaps to get it to release from the thread then pop the balloon and extract it carefully instructions round 0 start with a magic_ring of 9 ​ stitches round 1 1 climbing chain and 17 double_crochet for ​ a total of 18 st round 2 every st from round 1 will get 2 double_crochet ​ for total of 36 st round 3 here we want 12 sets of 2 double_crochet ​ 3 chain 2dc separated by skipping 1 st round 4 in each of the resulting 12 3ch ​ we want to put a set of 3 double_crochet 3 chain 3dc separated by 1 chain round 5 similar to round 4 except the sets ​ alternate between chain 4 and chain 3 and they are separated by 2 chain round 6 the start of the main motif ​ from here on up there is always 3 double_crochet 3 chain 3 double_crochet border between the motifs there s a joining 3 chain until round 13 when it becomes 4 chain that s 11 double_crochet s to squeeze into the 4ch from round 5 round 7 same border then 11 double_crochet s ​ separated by 1 chain round 8 to 13 from here up in the ​ motif put a double_crochet in the chain below 3 chain and repeat round 14 to 17 same thing actually just ​ make the joining chain 4 chain round 18 same with joining chain of 5 ​ chain round 19 motif is done so just join the ​ borders with 5 chain round 20 borders touch now ​ round 21 single_crochet chain around ​ loop not shown on the chart but very ​ important is to make a nice long chain and join it to the other side so you can hang the bauble on a tree
